name: Crypto Crime Fighter
description:
This is my entry for the 2021 Pygame Community Easter Jam. It's certainly not finished/polished, but I am pretty happy with how it came out given the time constraints and lack of previous experience with Pygame v2.

In Crypto Crime Fighter you play as Frank, a cyber security professional in the distant future, literally fighting with malware inside your computer systems through the use of a VR headset. 

Collecting computer chips will refill your health and has a chance to boost your attack power as you fight through waves of viruses.
